question.xref: DES s8, DES s10, HC r152
question.text: You want to turn right from a junction but your view is restricted by parked vehicles. What should you do?

explanation.text: If you want to turn right from a junction and your view is restricted, STOP. Ease forward until you can see – there might be something approaching. IF YOU DON’T KNOW, DON’T GO.

answer.text: Move out quickly, but be prepared to stop
Sound your horn and pull out if there is no reply
Stop, then move slowly forward until you have a clear view
Stop, get out and look along the main road to check
